name: DNovae

overview:
DNovae is a Spanish digital media company that integrates strategic IT consulting services with the development and implementation of communication strategies based on multi-platform video distribution content. DNOVAE has developed unique video encoding and distribution software Hollybyteâ„¢, the world’s first online video platform developed in GWT Google Code technology.

Hollybyteâ„¢ is powerful and user friendly software that provides a suite of video publishing, analytics, and monetization capabilities. Through Hollybyteâ„¢, video content owners achieve enhanced video mass publishing, instant multi-device and multi-platform encoding, social media integration, automatic indexing and consumption analytics amongst other features. Hollybyte’sâ„¢ cloud paradigm and Google look-and-feel interface allows anyone anywhere to manage and mass publish multi-platform video content with low costs.

DNovae’s clients include major global media companies, financial organizations and web marketeers such as Sony Pictures Releasing, Spain’s Savings Banks Association and HAVAS media.
